module.name: Missed Call Notifications
module.changelog: *0.5* Fix issue with non space padded extension when altering dialplan directly for fw>=2.10.1.4 *0.4* Fix issue when FW was enabled email would end up on ringing exten instead of intended exten *0.3* Fix error in app category *0.2* Change minimum requirements, update module.xml *0.1* New
module.description: This will allow notifications to be sent to users if they have missed a call.
